short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Discogs experience with dark themes, seller tools, price comparisons, currency conversion, powerful filters, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your Discogs Experience with Discogs Enhancer!

Discover a powerful, customizable extension designed to transform how you use Discogs. Whether you're buying, selling, or managing your vinyl collection, Discogs Enhancer makes every step easier and more efficient.

Key Features Vinyl Enthusiasts Love:

• Dark Mode Options: Choose from three stunning themes that sync with your operating system’s settings.

• Block Sellers & Buyers: Filter out unwanted marketplace interactions effortlessly.

• Price Comparison & Currency Conversion: Shop smarter with real-time insights tailored to your region.

• Advanced Marketplace Filters: Find exactly what you need with filters for price, shipping country, media condition, and more.

• Streamlined Collection & Wantlist Management: Access enhanced stats, full-width layouts, and detailed item data.

• Quick Search & Infinite Scrolling: Speed up browsing for releases, artists, and labels.

• Favorite Sellers & Tags: Highlight trusted sellers with custom badges.

More Features to Supercharge Your Discogs Workflow:

• Color-coded media and sleeve conditions for quick scanning.

• Demand index and price suggestions directly on release pages.

• Notifications for buyer and seller feedback.

• Enhanced track details like total playtime on release pages.

• Text formatting shortcuts, editing tools, and an integrated notepad for releases.

• Easily remove items from your Wantlist from the Marketplace page.

• Customizable contextual menu search, layout, and navigation settings.

Every feature is optional and fully configurable, so you can tailor the extension to your needs.

Who’s It For?
Discogs Enhancer is perfect for:

Vinyl/CD/media collectors who want deeper insights into their collection.
Buyers and sellers seeking a more efficient marketplace experience.
Music enthusiasts looking for tools to enhance their discovery journey.

Why Choose Discogs Enhancer?
Take control of your Discogs experience with tools designed by and for vinyl lovers. Whether you're organizing your collection or finding the best deals in the marketplace, Discogs Enhancer has you covered.

Open Source and Community-Driven
Discogs Enhancer is proudly open source. Check it out or contribute to the project on GitHub: https://github.com/salcido/discogs-enhancer or join the Discogs Enhancer group on Discogs: https://www.discogs.com/group/9136

Privacy Disclaimer 

In accordance with Google's User Data Transparency Policy, Discogs Enhancer does not collect or store any private or personally identifiable information. Discogs Enhancer is not affiliated with Discogs.com. It's developed by me, in my free time, for fun :)
